unnormalised: Arrey bhai, 2BHK Mumbai-ant ₹2Cr-ak? Mhojea ponjea-ponjan '47-ant Rajasthan-ant ₹500-ak ek haveli ghetli! Dista asa property-che rates thode vatterle, nhoi?
normalised: Arrey bhai, Mumbai-ant don B-H-K don crore rupayak? Mhojea panjbean Rajasthan-ant chalis ani sat-ant panch rupayak ek haveli ghetli! Dhaun ghe property-che rate thode vaddle asat, nhui?
text: Arrey bhai, 2BHK Mumbai-ant ₹2Cr-ak? Mhojea ponjea-ponjan '47-ant Rajasthan-ant ₹500-ak ek haveli ghetli! Dista asa property-che rates thode vatterle, nhoi?
